lines.text:
[to Elmo]
You got 2 more wishes, son. Don't waste them.
You wished for a glass of water?

[Cookie Monster pretends to be Santa Claus to get Elmo's cookies]
Ha ha ha! You're not Santa Claus, you're Cookie Monster!
Oh well, what the hey? Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
Elmo won't fall asleep, no no no, not like last year.
I wish it were Christmas every day.
Christmas every day? Didn't Elmo tell you how he saved Christmas and then almost lost it again?
How come Maria and Luis aren't fixing the toasters?
Oh, we're too busy celebratin' Christmas.
Eating turkeys! It's a full-time job! Who has time to work?'!
